text: Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā chattupāhanaṃ dhāreyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā chattupāhanaṃ dhāreyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 84. Should any bhikkhunī, not being ill, use a sunshade and leather footwear (outside a monastery), it is to be confessed. [Sunshade: Cv.V.23.3; Footwear: See Mv.I.30, Mv.V.4.3, Mv.V.5.2]
